experience.title: Software Developer (Full-Time)
experience.description: I am actively involved in web platforms developed for the digitalization, remote management, and reporting of machinery on the factory floor. I perform optimizations, bug fixes, and new module developments in existing systems.

experience.title: K-Team Program Participant (Work Experience)
experience.description: I worked on Linux and Docker container architectures on Jetson devices. I provided technical support for image processing applications by participating in both office and field projects. I developed web interfaces with React and created MongoDB queries with Python. I gained full-stack skills by accessing virtual servers and remote devices via terminal commands.

experience.title: Data Management Department (Internship)
experience.description: I trained a model using YOLOv8 to detect individuals wearing or not wearing helmets. I managed data analysis, labeling, and training processes using Roboflow. I gained experience in data preparation and model training for image processing projects.

experience.title: Industrial Applications & Department (Internship)
experience.description: I developed Docker applications using Jetson devices and gained experience in active terminal usage on Linux-based systems.
